reviewText: This is a great game. I especially like the hand drawn art. the music fits the game perfectly. The only thing I could think of that would make the game better is if the characters said more instead of the same voise track over and over. There is nothing wrong with them, there just should be more.
voteText: 4 of 6 people (67%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Great game, just the only thing that I think it needs is that you can fight the other charcters by yourself instead of having to do the time survival mode over and over again, or the slime beast. unless that option is already there and i am not paying enough attention
